Lurker, dude, calm down. =)

Ellen (or Sarah i think), I've sent you about 3 private emails now, 
and at least posted one over the messageboard. Now I'm going to go 
and find them if I can, copy-paste them in here with my mad l33t 
copy paste skillz, and hope you read and comply.

Rudrak is not acting like a god, and is definately not wrong. His 
words are for your own sake, and as such, are to be heeded. Now, 
read and accept the following words:

<<Ellen (or Sarah?), go to http://mail.yahoo.com and sign up for a 
yahoo email address. After you've done that, log in, and send me a 
confirmation email to show that you've signed up. After that, I'll 
give you further training, and instructions.>>

That was post number 51315. You can go read it yourself if you like, 
but regardless, you must do what I've asked you to do. I don't know 
for sure if you've gotten any of the emails I've sent you, but if 
you haven't I really hope you get this one, cause otherwise one of 
the moderators will be forced to moderate you until you start to 
listen...
